channel.title: software design on sergem's personal public notebook

item.title: Free UML editor
item.description: I found free UML editor: ArgoUML [http://argouml.tigris.org/](http://argouml.tigris.org/" style="background-color: transparent;)It seems not bad I have tried gliffy.com. It is online and paid. www.lucidchart.com has free version but it seems not so convenient
